document.full_text: an uproar over lapses by u.s. air traffic controllers will spill into congress where critics of organized labor see an unexpected opening to push their agenda into sweeping aviation legislation.
document.title: furor over air controllers to spill into congress
lines_and_colors: an uproar over lapses by u.s. air traffic controllers will spill into congress where critics of organized labor see an unexpected opening to push their agenda into sweeping aviation legislation.
